PerfectNetExp.abs: ...ide forward with ones chin up stride proudly ahead昂扬 highspirited盎 abundant bowl dish pot

entry.def: Someone who is high-spirited is very lively and easily excited.

entry.tran: （马）烈性的，暴躁的，欢蹦乱跳的
entry.def: A high-spirited horse is difficult to control because it is very lively, active, or nervous.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
